name: Air Fryer Crunchy Fish Tacos with Slaw
description: Crispy whiting portions tucked into warm taco shells with slaw, salsa, and creamy avocado dip. Fast, family-friendly, and mild.
prep_steps: Set out 12 taco shells on a plate.
Open the slaw, salsa, and avocado dip so they’re ready to use.
Optional: Warm taco shells in the microwave for 20–30 seconds just before assembly.
cook_steps: Air fry whiting portions in a single layer for 8–10 minutes until hot and crisp, shaking the basket halfway.
Microwave taco shells for 20–30 seconds to soften slightly (if not already warmed).
Fill each taco shell with a small handful of slaw.
Add 1 whiting portion per taco (cut in half if needed to fit).
Top with a spoon of salsa and a dollop of avocado dip.
Squeeze lemon wedges over tacos to taste and serve immediately.

ingredients.preparation: air fry from frozen or chilled per pack guidance
